messages.content: Hey thanks for getting back to me. I think I'll wait till the restaurants open back up lol thanks all the same ð x

Hey Gus! Nancy here ðð½ the guys at pizza punks just filled me in on what happened last night - Iâm so sorry! And no definitely not the service we thrive for - 
Luckily I know youâve had our yummy pizzas before so no definitely not as tasty as the norm. 
Any chance I can arrange for another drop with you to make it up to you? Perhaps next week? 
Hereâs my number in case you want to pop me over a text instead +44 7940 254389. Nancy xx

Hi Gus, I am so sorry and embarrassed to hear this! Iâll investigate with the team in the restaurant tonight and weâll get back to you tomorrow with a full explanation! This is 100% not the service we strive to deliver (literally!) and will of course make this up to you! Please bear with us until we investigate fully! ðð¤ð»

I just got 2 cold pizzas delivered there from pizza punks nearly 4 hours late? Should have been delivered around about 5. They were Looking like they had been sitting there for 4 hours but there was another box with 2 pizzas to make myself. The delivery driver said they had been really swamped but surely you wouldn't dish that out to a paying customer?
Mac and cheese and BBQ wings for starter and a Cheeseburger pizza with a messy Mexican one. I had said to the pr guys to deliver at 5 today. Thanks alot Nancy xx
Cooking at home? Hahaha Yeah I think it was with the Mac and cheese, I was sitting in and asked for the cheese sauce and it was amazing lol ok I'll have a look. Thanks my postcode is G641hp 32. X

Mmh! You know what - the agency will have been contacting you to try out our bake at home / DoughIY kits at home. 
But I can sort you out with a hot delivery â whatâs your postcode?? As long as youâre close enough - should be fine lol. I think you had the mac & cheese? 
We changed our menu a bit since last sept / October. Have a look at the new menu pizzapunks.co.uk. 
Email me over your order and what date and rough time suits you best. 

You can choose from two pizzas and sides â¥ï¸ Nancy XX

Hi Nancy, I love pizza punks lol sorry I didn't get an email off you. If you can sort me out a kit that would be amazing thanks. I was going to ask cos I've been to pizza punks a few times and the best thing about it was the unlimited toppings and the cheese sauce ð There was only a couple of options on the website I was sent to and I was to choose only 2 pizzas out of a choice of 4 and one was plain cheese and you didn't do the cheese sauce on the side, see my previous pizza punks post ð. Was that a takeaway thing the limited options? X

Hey Gus! Nancy here! Yeah thatâs our agency at the moment â¥ï¸ Iâm sure youâve got my email already anyway? Nancy@pizzapunks.co.uk. Let me know if I can sort out a kit for you to try. Nancy xx
